name: Hidden Lands - Spot the differences 3D
description:
Hidden Lands Hidden Lands is a procedurally generated Spot The Difference 3D game with beautiful artstyle and endless levels.
Explore ancient worlds to find pieces of lost civilizations.

Find the differences between 3d floating lands to restore their beauty and enjoy landscapes with a sublime marvelous design.
Observe carefully these nature simulations and solve all the quest to unlock objects and discover magical civilizations.

Features
  • Easy to use
  • Infinite levels
  • Comfortable Zoom and Rotation
  • Share your favourite lands!
  • Dynamic and relaxing music
